test-case.name: fn-base-uri-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with no arguments and no context node set. Should raise runtime error.

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-2
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with context item no a node.

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-3
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to the empty sequence.

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-4
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to a comment node (via direct construction as argument).

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-5
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to a comment node (via computed construction as argument).

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-6
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to a text node (via computed construction as argument).

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-7
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to an Element node with no xml-base argument (via computed construction as argument).

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-8
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to an Element node with no xml-base argument (via direct construction as argument).

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-9
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to an Element node with xml-base argument (via direct construction as argument).

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-10
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to an Element node with xml-base argument (via direct construction as argument). Requires no escaping of characters.

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-11
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to a Document node (via computed construction as argument).

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-12
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to a Document node (via computed construction as argument). Use declared base-uri property.

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-13
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to an Element node (via direct construction as argument). Use declared base-uri property.

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-14
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to an attribute node (via computed construction as argument).

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-15
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to a PI node (via direct construction as argument).

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-16
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to a PI node (via computed construction as argument).

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-17
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to a PI node (via computed construction as argument).

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-18
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to an element node (via direct construction as part of FLOWR expr). Uses declared base-uri property.

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-19
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to an element node (via direct construction as part of FLOWR expr). Uses "xml-base" attribute.

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-20
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to an element node (via direct construction as part of FLOWR expr). Uses "xml-base" attribute and should ignore declare base-uri property.

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-21
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to comment node (via direct construction as part of FLOWR expr). Should ignore declare base-uri property.

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-22
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to "." and no context node set. Should raise runtime error.

test-case.name: fn-base-uri-23
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "base-uri" function with argument set to an Element node with xml-base argument (via direct construction as argument). Requires escaping of characters.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-BaseURIFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `base-uri((), "wrong param")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-BaseURIFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(base-uri(()))`.

test-case.description: Ensure comments pick up the correct xml:base value.

test-case.name: K2-BaseURIFunc-13
test-case.description: Ensure computed comments don't pick up the base-uri from the static context.

test-case.description: Ensure computed comments don't pick up the base-uri from the static context.

test-case.description: Ensure computed processing-instructions don't pick up the base-uri from the static context.

test-case.description: Ensure computed attributes don't pick up the base-uri from the static context.

test-case.description: Ensure computed attributes pick up the base-uri from parent.

test-case.description: Ensure computed attributes pick up the resolved base-uri of the parent.

test-case.description: Ensure that the return value of document-uri() is of correct type.

test-case.description: Ensure that the base URI is empty for direct PI constructors.

test-case.name: K2-BaseURIFunc-23
test-case.description: Ensure that the base URI is empty for computed PI constructors.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-BaseURIFunc-24
test-case.description: Ensure that the base URI is empty for direct PI constructors, with no base-uri declaration.

test-case.name: K2-BaseURIFunc-25
test-case.description: Ensure that the base URI is empty for computed PI constructors, with no base-uri declaration.

test-case.description: Ensure that the base URI is empty for computed attribute constructors, with no base-uri declaration.

test-case.description: Ensure that the base URI is set for computed documents.

test-case.description: Check the document URI and base URI simultaneously for a computed document node.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-BaseURIFunc-29
test-case.description: Use an URI in an xml:base element that is a valid URI, but an invalid HTTP URL. Since implementations aren't required to validate specific schemes but allowed to, this may either raise an error or return the URI.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-BaseURIFunc-30
test-case.description: Use an empty xml:base attribute.

test-case.description: Compute the base URI from a processing instruction.
